column3: Verify Log Analytics workspace deployment and configuration
column4: 1. Validate workspace exists 2. Check SKU and retention settings 3. Verify diagnostic settings 4. Test query capability
column5: Log Analytics workspace operational with correct configuration

column3: Test Azure Sentinel enablement on Log Analytics workspace
column4: 1. Verify Sentinel enabled 2. Check licensing 3. Validate workspace connection 4. Test Sentinel portal access
column5: Azure Sentinel operational and accessible in Azure Portal

column3: Validate Azure AD sign-in and audit log ingestion
column4: 1. Configure AAD connector 2. Generate test sign-in events 3. Query SigninLogs table 4. Verify data completeness
column5: Azure AD logs appear in SigninLogs table within 5 minutes

column3: Test Office 365 audit log ingestion and parsing
column4: 1. Enable O365 connector 2. Generate O365 activity 3. Query OfficeActivity table 4. Verify event details
column5: Office 365 events ingested with correct schema and details

column3: Validate Defender for Cloud security alerts integration
column4: 1. Enable Defender connector 2. Generate test security alert 3. Query SecurityAlert table 4. Verify alert correlation
column5: Defender alerts appear in Sentinel with full context

column3: Test Defender for Endpoint telemetry ingestion
column4: 1. Configure Defender connector 2. Generate endpoint events 3. Query DeviceEvents table 4. Verify data correlation
column5: Endpoint security events available for correlation

column3: Validate CEF and Syslog data collection from third-party sources
column4: 1. Configure CEF forwarder 2. Send test CEF messages 3. Query CommonSecurityLog 4. Verify parsing accuracy
column5: Third-party security logs parsed correctly in CommonSecurityLog

column3: Test Microsoft built-in detection rules activation and alerting
column4: 1. Enable built-in rules 2. Generate test attack scenarios 3. Monitor alert generation 4. Verify alert accuracy
column5: Built-in rules generate accurate alerts for known attack patterns

column3: Validate custom detection rules for organization-specific threats
column4: 1. Deploy custom KQL rules 2. Execute threat simulation 3. Monitor detection 4. Validate rule logic
column5: Custom rules detect organization-specific threat patterns

column3: Test User Entity Behavior Analytics detection capabilities
column4: 1. Enable UEBA 2. Generate behavioral anomalies 3. Monitor UEBA alerts 4. Validate accuracy
column5: UEBA detects behavioral anomalies with acceptable accuracy

column3: Validate threat intelligence feed integration and matching
column4: 1. Configure TI feeds 2. Submit test IoCs 3. Verify TI matching 4. Test alert generation
column5: Threat intelligence matches generate alerts for known IoCs

column3: Test automated incident creation from alerts
column4: 1. Configure incident settings 2. Generate qualifying alerts 3. Verify incident creation 4. Check incident details
column5: Incidents automatically created from high-severity alerts

column3: Validate automated enrichment playbook execution
column4: 1. Trigger enrichment playbook 2. Monitor execution 3. Verify enrichment data 4. Check incident update
column5: Playbook enriches incidents with IP and domain reputation data

column3: Test automated containment actions via playbook
column4: 1. Trigger containment playbook 2. Monitor execution 3. Verify containment action 4. Confirm rollback capability
column5: Playbook executes containment actions with audit trail

column3: Validate ServiceNow ticket creation via playbook
column4: 1. Configure ServiceNow integration 2. Trigger ticketing playbook 3. Verify ticket creation 4. Check bi-directional sync
column5: ServiceNow tickets created with correct incident details

column3: Description
column4: Test Steps
column5: Expected Results

column3: Test maximum data ingestion capability under load
column4: 1. Generate high-volume log data 2. Monitor ingestion rates 3. Check for data loss 4. Measure lag time
column5: System ingests 500GB/day without data loss or significant lag

column3: Measure KQL query response times across data volumes
column4: 1. Execute standard security queries 2. Measure response times 3. Test with increasing data 4. Document performance
column5: 90% of queries complete within 30 seconds

column3: Measure mean time to detect for various attack scenarios
column4: 1. Execute attack simulations 2. Record detection timestamp 3. Calculate MTTD 4. Compare to target
column5: MTTD under 15 minutes target for all high-priority detections

column3: Measure mean time to respond with automation
column4: 1. Generate incidents 2. Record response timestamps 3. Calculate MTTR 4. Compare to target
column5: MTTR under 60 minutes target with playbook automation

column3: Measure false positive rate across all detection rules
column4: 1. Monitor alerts for 48 hours 2. Classify true/false positives 3. Calculate FP rate 4. Tune rules
column5: False positive rate below 50% threshold (target: 15%)

column3: Test playbook execution performance and reliability
column4: 1. Trigger multiple playbooks 2. Measure execution times 3. Track success rates 4. Monitor failures
column5: Playbooks complete within 5 minutes with 99% success rate

column3: Test system performance with multiple concurrent SOC users
column4: 1. Simulate concurrent sessions 2. Execute parallel queries 3. Monitor performance 4. Measure degradation
column5: Support 20+ concurrent users with under 10% performance degradation

column3: Validate security workbook and dashboard performance
column4: 1. Access security workbooks 2. Measure load times 3. Test with various time ranges 4. Monitor resources
column5: Security dashboards load within 5 seconds

column3: Verify log retention and archival policies
column4: 1. Check hot retention (90 days) 2. Verify archive storage 3. Test data retrieval 4. Confirm compliance
column5: Data retained per policy with successful archive retrieval

column3: Verify 99.9% availability for Sentinel services
column4: 1. Configure availability monitoring 2. Track uptime over 30 days 3. Log all outages 4. Calculate availability
column5: Sentinel services maintain 99.9% or higher availability

column3: Test role-based access control performance impact
column4: 1. Test different user roles 2. Measure access times 3. Verify permission enforcement 4. Check audit logging
column5: RBAC enforced without significant performance impact

column3: Test system handling of high alert volumes
column4: 1. Generate 1000+ alerts/hour 2. Monitor processing 3. Check for dropped alerts 4. Verify incident creation
column5: System handles peak alert volumes without dropping alerts
